The plant typically grows as an annual or perennial herb, often found in moist, well-drained soils. Its flowers, which are usually yellow or orange, bloom in summer and attract pollinators such as bees and butterflies. The plant is sometimes cultivated for its ornamental value due to its attractive foliage and blooms.
